description: .Application for non-material amendment to 13F/1599 - (Application for the redevelopment of the Royal Liverpool University Hospital to comprise: in full, demolition of existing structures, erection of core hospital buildings (main acute hospital and clinical science and support building), vehicular and pedestrian access (including blue light), car parking, vehicular drop off/arrival areas, pedestrian routes and soft and hard landscaping; temporary parking, access, drop off and landscaping; and in outline with all matters reserved, related healthcare and ancillary development, including car parking and access.
site_address: Royal Liverpool University Hospital, Prescot Street, Liverpool, L7 8XP
